files.description: Setup file for Quran Secrets package. Contains configuration details for packaging and installation of the Quran Secrets application.
List of required packages for the project. Specifies dependencies like camel_tools and scipy.
Initialization file for quran_secrets package, used to mark the src directory as a Python package and perform any package-level initializations if required.
Main driver for the Quran Secrets application. Orchestrates reading the Quran text, preprocessing it, invoking analysis functions from src/analyzer, and logging the comprehensive results.

functions.name: main
functions.description: Main entry point that reads the Quran text, preprocesses it, performs various analyses, logs results, and generates the final report.

files.description: Module for reading the Quran text from a file. Contains a function to open a file and return its contents, or raise an IOError if the file cannot be read.

functions.name: read_quran_text
functions.description: Read and return the text from the specified Quran file. Raises an IOError if the file cannot be read.

parameters.name: file_path
parameters.description: The path to the Quran text file.

files.description: This module provides functionality for preprocessing and normalizing Arabic text. It includes functions to remove diacritics and normalize specific Arabic letters according to certain rules. The module is designed to standardize Arabic text for further processing in NLP or text analysis applications.

functions.name: remove_diacritics
functions.description: Removes all Arabic diacritical marks (tashkeel) from the input text. These marks include fatha, kasra, damma, sukun, shadda, and other vowel marks that appear above or below letters in Arabic script. The function uses regular expressions to identify and remove these marks.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The original Arabic text containing diacritics that need to be removed.

functions.name: normalize_arabic_letters
functions.description: Normalizes specific Arabic letters in the given text according to contextual rules. It specifically handles two cases: 1) Converting the Arabic letter 'ى' (alef maqsura, U+0649) to 'ي' (yeh, U+064A) only when it appears as a standalone word, and 2) Converting the Arabic letter 'ة' (teh marbuta, U+0629) to 'ه' (heh, U+0647) when it appears at the end of words. This normalization helps standardize text variations that are semantically equivalent in Arabic.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The Arabic text to be normalized.

files.description: Module for analyzing the Quran text for hidden patterns and anomalies. Contains a comprehensive set of functions that perform text analysis, word frequency, Arabic root and lemma analysis, bigram analysis, verse repetition analysis, abjad numeral analysis, semantic symmetry checks, Muqatta'at extraction and analysis, as well as various correlation and distribution analyses.

functions.name: analyze_text
functions.description: Analyzes the given text for hidden numerical patterns and anomalies. Returns a list of anomaly messages.

functions.name: analyze_word_frequency
functions.description: Performs word frequency analysis on the given text and identifies unusually high or low word frequencies.

functions.name: analyze_root_words
functions.description: Performs Arabic root word analysis using CAMeL Tools and returns a summary, frequency dictionary, and top root words.

functions.name: analyze_bigrams
functions.description: Generates and counts n-grams (default bigrams) from a list of tokens.

parameters.name: tokenized_text
parameters.description: A list of tokens from the Quran text.

parameters.name: n
parameters.description: The n-gram size, default is 2 for bigrams.

functions.name: analyze_verse_repetitions
functions.description: Analyzes verse repetitions within each surah and across the entire Quran.

functions.name: analyze_lemmas
functions.description: Performs lemma analysis on the text using CAMeL Tools and returns a formatted summary of the top lemmas.

functions.name: analyze_surah_verse_counts
functions.description: Counts the number of verses per surah and returns a formatted summary.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The Quran text loaded from the data file.

functions.name: analyze_verse_lengths_distribution
functions.description: Calculates and analyzes the distribution of verse lengths for each surah and flags surahs with consistent verse lengths.

parameters.name: threshold
parameters.description: Standard deviation threshold to consider a surah as consistent; default is 2.

functions.name: analyze_palindromes
functions.description: Identifies palindromic words or phrases within each verse and logs detected palindromes.

functions.name: analyze_abjad_numerals
functions.description: Calculates the Abjad numerical sum for each verse and logs verses with notable numerical patterns.

functions.name: analyze_semantic_symmetry
functions.description: Calculates the number of common words between two halves of each surah to assess semantic symmetry.

functions.name: analyze_verse_length_symmetry
functions.description: Analyzes verse length symmetry between two halves of each surah and flags surahs with significant symmetry.

parameters.name: avg_threshold
parameters.description: Maximum allowed difference in average verse length between halves.

parameters.name: stddev_threshold
parameters.description: Maximum allowed difference in standard deviation between halves.

functions.name: analyze_enhanced_semantic_symmetry
functions.description: Performs enhanced semantic analysis by comparing lemma overlap between surah halves.

parameters.name: symmetry_threshold
parameters.description: Minimum normalized lemma overlap required to flag symmetry.

functions.name: analyze_muqattaat
functions.description: Extracts and analyzes Muqatta'at sequences from surahs that begin with them.

functions.name: analyze_muqattaat_positions
functions.description: Analyzes the positions of Muqatta'at within the Quran text and returns a summary.

functions.name: analyze_muqattaat_preceding_context
functions.description: Performs word frequency analysis on verses preceding surahs with Muqatta'at.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The preprocessed Quran text with surah and ayah information.

functions.name: analyze_muqattaat_themes
functions.description: Associates surahs with Muqatta'at to predefined themes and logs higher level messages.

functions.name: analyze_muqattaat_context
functions.description: Analyzes verses following Muqatta'at to extract contextual word frequency insights.

functions.name: analyze_muqattaat_numerical_values
functions.description: Performs numerical analysis specific to Muqatta'at and returns a placeholder summary.

functions.name: calculate_abjad_value
functions.description: Calculates the total Abjad numerical value for a given Arabic letter sequence.

parameters.name: sequence
parameters.description: A string of Arabic letters representing the Muqatta'at sequence.

functions.name: get_surah_verse_counts
functions.description: Computes the number of verses in each surah from the Quran text.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The Quran text with one verse per line.

functions.name: analyze_muqattaat_verse_count_correlation
functions.description: Analyzes the correlation between Muqatta'at Abjad value and surah verse counts using Pearson correlation.

functions.name: analyze_muqattaat_verse_parity
functions.description: Analyzes whether surahs with Muqatta'at have an even or odd number of verses and compares with overall distribution.

functions.name: analyze_muqattaat_root_cooccurrence
functions.description: Analyzes the co-occurrence of Muqatta'at with frequent Arabic root words in surahs.

parameters.name: top_n
parameters.description: The number of top root words to consider; default is 5.

functions.name: analyze_muqattaat_sequences
functions.description: Counts the frequency of unique Muqatta'at sequences in the Quran text.

functions.name: analyze_muqattaat_length
functions.description: Analyzes the lengths of Muqatta'at sequences and categorizes surahs based on sequence length distribution.

functions.name: categorize_surahs_by_muqattaat
functions.description: Categorizes surahs into those with and without Muqatta'at based on the text.

functions.name: analyze_grouped_root_frequencies
functions.description: Analyzes and computes grouped Arabic root word frequencies for specified surahs.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The preprocessed Quran text containing verses.

parameters.name: surahs
parameters.description: List of surah numbers to include in the analysis.

functions.name: analyze_grouped_lemma_frequencies
functions.description: Analyzes and aggregates lemma frequencies for specified surahs.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The preprocessed Quran text containing verses.

parameters.name: surahs
parameters.description: List of surah numbers to include in the analysis.

functions.name: compare_surahs_muqattaat_vs_non_muqattaat
functions.description: Compares surahs with Muqatta'at against those without by computing average verse lengths and top word frequencies.

functions.name: analyze_muqattaat_distribution_meccan_medinan
functions.description: Analyzes the distribution of Muqatta'at between Meccan and Medinan surahs based on a classification mapping.

parameters.name: surah_classification
parameters.description: Mapping of surah numbers to their classification (Meccan or Medinan).

functions.name: analyze_correlations
functions.description: Analyzes correlations across different analytical dimensions in the text, integrating various analysis results.

parameters.name: word_frequency_result
parameters.description: Word frequency analysis summary and flagged words.

parameters.name: flagged_words
parameters.description: List of flagged words from analysis.

parameters.name: abjad_anomalies
parameters.description: List of anomalies from Abjad numeral analysis.

functions.name: analyze_muqattaat_semantic_similarity
functions.description: Groups surahs by their Muqatta'at and analyzes semantic similarity among them.

parameters.name: muqattaat_data
parameters.description: Mapping of surah numbers to their Muqatta'at sequences.

functions.name: compare_interpretations_with_analysis
functions.description: Compares scholarly interpretations of Muqatta'at with analysis data and logs comparison results.

parameters.name: interpretations
parameters.description: Dictionary of interpretations with source and summary information.

functions.name: finalize_muqattaat_analysis
functions.description: Synthesizes all Muqatta'at analysis results and logs a final conclusion regarding the Muqatta'at mystery.

functions.name: generate_muqattaat_report
functions.description: Generates a human-readable report summarizing the Muqatta'at analysis.

functions.name: review_muqattaat_report
functions.description: Reviews the generated Muqatta'at report and returns a concluding statement.

parameters.name: report_content
parameters.description: The content of the Muqatta'at analysis report.

functions.name: synthesize_muqattaat_analyses
functions.description: Synthesizes various Muqatta'at analysis results and logs a synthesized summary.

functions.name: analyze_conjunction_frequency
functions.description: Analyzes the frequency of common Arabic conjunctions in surahs with and without Muqatta'at, and logs potential discrepancies.

functions.name: analyze_word_type_distribution
functions.description: Analyzes the distribution of word types (nouns, verbs, particles) between surahs with and without Muqatta'at using CAMeL Tools morphological analysis.

files.description: Module for logging analysis outputs of the Quran Secrets application. Provides functions to log secret findings, results, and bigram frequencies into a log file with timestamps.

functions.name: log_secret_found
functions.description: Logs a secret finding to the results.log file with a special tag and a timestamp.

functions.name: log_result
functions.description: Logs a result message to the results.log file with a timestamp.

functions.name: log_bigram_frequencies
functions.description: Logs the top N most frequent bigrams to the results log file including header and frequency counts for the top N bigrams.

parameters.name: bigram_frequencies
parameters.description: A dictionary mapping bigram tuples to frequency counts.

parameters.name: top_n
parameters.description: The number of top bigrams to log (default is 20).

files.description: Initialization file for tests directory to mark it as a package and perform any necessary test setup.
Unit tests for the file_reader module that test reading an existing file and handling errors for non-existing files.

classes.name: TestFileReader
classes.description: Unit test class for testing the file_reader module including tests for reading existing files and error handling when files do not exist.

methods.name: test_read_existing_file
methods.description: Test reading an existing file returns correct content.

methods.name: test_read_non_existing_file
methods.description: Test that reading a non-existing file raises an IOError.

files.description: Unit tests for the text_preprocessor module testing the removal of diacritics and normalization of Arabic letters.

classes.name: TestTextPreprocessor
classes.description: Unit test class for the text_preprocessor module, ensuring proper functionality of diacritics removal and Arabic letter normalization.

methods.name: test_remove_diacritics
methods.description: Test removal of Arabic diacritics from text.

methods.name: test_normalize_arabic_letters
methods.description: Test normalization of specific Arabic letters in text.

files.description: Unit tests for the analyzer module. Contains test cases for all functions in the analyzer module using the unittest framework.

classes.name: TestAnalyzer
classes.description: Test suite for the analyzer module covering functions such as text analysis, word frequency, Arabic root analysis, bigrams, palindromes, Abjad numerals, semantic symmetry, verse repetitions, Muqatta'at analyses, and interpretation comparisons.

methods.name: setUp
methods.description: Initialize test environment for analyzer tests.

methods.name: test_analyze_non_empty
methods.description: Test that a non-empty text returns a simulated anomaly.

methods.name: test_analyze_empty
methods.description: Test that an empty text returns no anomalies.

methods.name: test_analyze_word_frequency_summary
methods.description: Test that word frequency analysis returns a proper summary and flagged list.

methods.name: test_analyze_word_frequency_with_flags
methods.description: Test that word frequency analysis flags unusual word frequencies.

methods.name: test_analyze_root_words_empty
methods.description: Test Arabic root word analysis on empty text.

methods.name: test_analyze_root_words_sample
methods.description: Test Arabic root word analysis on sample text with a mocked CAMeL Tools analyzer.

methods.name: test_analyze_bigrams_empty
methods.description: Test that analyze_bigrams returns an empty dictionary when provided an empty or insufficient tokenized text.

methods.name: test_analyze_bigrams_sample
methods.description: Test analyze_bigrams with a sample tokenized text for correct bigram generation and frequency counting.

methods.name: test_analyze_palindromes_detects_palindrome
methods.description: Test that analyze_palindromes detects palindromic words and phrases.

methods.name: test_analyze_abjad_numerals_detects_patterns
methods.description: Test that analyze_abjad_numerals detects notable numerical patterns.

methods.name: test_analyze_semantic_symmetry_detects_symmetry
methods.description: Test that analyze_semantic_symmetry detects significant word overlap.

methods.name: test_analyze_verse_repetitions
methods.description: Test that analyze_verse_repetitions correctly identifies repetitions both within a Surah and across the Quran.

methods.name: test_analyze_verse_lengths_distribution
methods.description: Test that analyze_verse_lengths_distribution correctly calculates average verse lengths, standard deviation, and flags consistent surahs.

methods.name: test_analyze_verse_length_symmetry_symmetry_detected
methods.description: Test that analyze_verse_length_symmetry detects symmetry when both halves have similar verse lengths.

methods.name: test_analyze_verse_length_symmetry_non_symmetric
methods.description: Test that analyze_verse_length_symmetry returns non-symmetric when verse lengths differ significantly.

methods.name: test_analyze_enhanced_semantic_symmetry_symmetry_detected
methods.description: Test that analyze_enhanced_semantic_symmetry detects semantic symmetry when lemma overlap is high.

methods.name: test_analyze_enhanced_semantic_symmetry_low_symmetry
methods.description: Test that analyze_enhanced_semantic_symmetry returns a low symmetry score when lemma overlap is minimal.

methods.name: test_analyze_muqattaat_semantic_similarity
methods.description: Test the Muqatta'at semantic similarity function with a sample group of Surahs.

methods.name: test_compare_interpretations_with_analysis
methods.description: Test the compare_interpretations_with_analysis function using different scholarly interpretations.

files.description: This file contains unit tests for the logger module. It tests the functionality of logging secret findings and general results. The tests use unittest framework with mocking to isolate the tests from actual file operations and datetime dependencies.

classes.name: TestLogger
classes.description: A test class that contains test cases for the logger module. It verifies that the logging functions correctly format and write messages to the log file.

methods.name: setUp
methods.description: Initializes the test environment by setting maxDiff to None to see full diff output in case of test failures.

methods.name: test_log_secret_found
methods.description: Tests that the log_secret_found function correctly formats and writes a message about a potential secret to the log file. It mocks the datetime and file operations to verify the exact output.

parameters.name: mock_datetime
parameters.description: Mocked datetime module to provide a fixed timestamp

parameters.name: mock_file
parameters.description: Mocked file open function to capture file writes

methods.name: test_log_result
methods.description: Tests that the log_result function correctly formats and writes a general result message to the log file. It mocks the datetime and file operations to verify the exact output.

parameters.name: mock_datetime
parameters.description: Mocked datetime module to provide a fixed timestamp

parameters.name: mock_file
parameters.description: Mocked file open function to capture file writes

files.description: Integration tests for the main module to execute end-to-end analysis of the Quran Secrets application.

classes.name: TestMainIntegration
classes.description: Integration test class for end-to-end execution of the Quran Secrets analysis.

methods.name: setUp
methods.description: Setup method executed before each test case.

methods.name: test_main_integration_fallback
methods.description: Tests full execution of the main function using CAMeL Tools fallback.

methods.name: test_main_integration_with_camel_tools
methods.description: Tests full execution of the main function with CAMeL Tools available.

methods.name: test_compare_surahs_muqattaat_vs_non_muqattaat
methods.description: Tests the correct categorization and analysis of surahs with and without Muqatta'at.

methods.name: test_finalize_muqattaat_analysis
methods.description: Tests the finalize_muqattaat_analysis function for correct output and integration.

methods.name: test_finalize_muqattaat_analysis_integration
methods.description: Tests the integration of finalize_muqattaat_analysis within the main function.

methods.name: test_compare_interpretations_with_analysis
methods.description: Tests the function that compares scholarly interpretations with analysis results.

files.description: Text file containing the Quran text. This file is used as input for the analysis performed by the Quran Secrets application.
Module for loading data files for the Quran Secrets application. Contains functions to load JSON data such as Muqatta'at interpretations.

functions.name: load_muqattaat_interpretations
functions.description: Loads and returns scholarly interpretations of Muqatta'at from a JSON file.

files.description: JSON file containing scholarly interpretations of the Muqatta'at. Includes interpretations from Ibn Kathir, Al-Suyuti, and modern linguistic scholars.
